items.title: Capello krabbelt terug na vergelijking van scheidsrechters met maffia
items.summary: Fabio Capello verleek de huidige generatie scheidsrechters maandag met een maffia-organisatie. De 79-jarige Italiaan heeft in een statement laten weten dat zijn woorden uit hun verband zijn gerukt.

items.title: Today on Sky Sports Racing: Sovereign Wealth bids to open account at Wolverhampton
items.summary: We have a busy day's racing on Tuesday with all-weather action from Southwell and Wolverhampton live on Sky Sports Racing...

items.title: England toil in Sydney as Smith and Head hit hundreds for Australia
items.summary: Steve Smith scored his first hundred of this Ashes series and Travis Head his third as Australia punished England's dropped catches to open up a 134-run lead after day three of the fifth and final Test at the Sydney Cricket Ground.

items.title: Should the NFL's two best teams be concerned?
items.summary: The Denver Broncos and Seattle Seahawks may enter the playoffs as the NFL's No 1 seeds, but question marks hover over their quarterbacks, believes Sky Sports NFL's Jeff Reinebold.

items.title: Premier League Darts: Humphries, Littler and Van Veen in title contention
items.summary: World No 1 Luke Littler and defending Premier League Darts champion Luke Humphries will headline Thursday nights from February until May. We profile the eight players.

items.title: Will Djokovic be ready for Australian Open after Adelaide withdrawal?
items.summary: Novak Djokovic has withdrawn ‚Äåfrom next week's Australian Open warm-up tournament in ‚ÄãAdelaide to focus on being ready for ‚Å†the year's first Grand Slam at Melbourne Park.

items.title: Dugarry haalt uit naar De Zerbi: 'Stop met die psychologie, man'
items.summary: Olympique Marseille leed zondag een dure thuisnederlaag tegen Nantes. Roberto De Zerbi sprak na dat duel zijn verbazing uit over de mentale weerbaarheid van zijn spelers en dat schoot bij Christophe Dugarry in het verkeerde keelgat. 'En dan legt hij je uit dat hij psycholoog moet worden...'

items.title: Farioli verklaart aanpak bij FC Porto: 'Dat waarderen spelers meer'
items.summary: Francesco Farioli heeft uitgebreid teruggeblikt op zijn eerste maanden als trainer van FC Porto. De Italiaan vertelde onder meer wat hij heeft geleerd van zijn laatste maand bij Ajax. 'Soms moet je iets accepteren en niet te veel vragen stellen.'

items.title: Klaassen: 'Wil nog minstens √©√©n keer kampioen worden met Ajax'
items.summary: Voor Davy Klaassen was 2025 een jaar dat hij niet snel zal vergeten, zowel in positieve als in negatieve zin. De 32-jarige aanvoerder van Ajax blikt nog eenmaal terug op de hoogte- en dieptepunten, en kijkt ook vooruit naar de toekomst. ‚ÄòHet kan ook weer heel snel omdraaien.‚Äô

items.title: Sources: United sacked Amorim after Wilcox row
items.summary: Ruben Amorim was sacked by Manchester United in the aftermath of an explosive meeting with director of football Jason Wilcox on Friday, sources have confirmed to ESPN.

items.title: Man City's Gvardiol to have surgery on broken leg
items.summary: Manchester City have confirmed that Josko Gvardiol has suffered a leg fracture and is set to undergo surgery this week.

items.title: Osimhen double puts Nigeria in AFCON quarters
items.summary: Nigeria's Super Eagles had no problems, aside from some rain, in Fes on Monday, as Victor Osimhen and Ademola Lookman produced an attacking masterclass against Mozambique to win 4-0 and advance to the AFCON quarterfinals.

items.title: Source: Barcelona in talks over Jo√£o Cancelo loan
items.summary: Barcelona are exploring a deal to bring Portugal international Jo√£o Cancelo back to the club in January, a source has confirmed to ESPN.

items.title: Man United must go big and hire a superstar manager after firing Ruben Amorim
items.summary: It is time for one of the most powerful clubs in the world to hire a manager with the experience, track record, credentials and personality befitting Man United's status.

items.title: Catalaanse media pakken uit: 'Barcelona heeft beet bij Cancelo'
items.summary: Internazionale zag hem graag komen als de vervanger van de geblesseerde Denzel Dumfries, maar alles wijst erop dat Jo√£o Cancelo (31) terug gaat keren naar Barcelona. De Catalaanse kranten SPORT en Mundo Deportivo pakken uit met het nieuws over een akkoord met Al-Hilal √©n de Portugese vleugelverdediger zelf over een huurdeal.

items.title: Stop experiments and get manager who fits Man Utd DNA - Neville
items.summary: Gary Neville urges Manchester United to 'stop experimenting' and appoint a manager who fits the club's DNA after Ruben Amorim was sacked on Monday.

items.title: Manchester United undecided on next managerial move after sacking Ruben Amorim
items.summary: Head coach goes after outburst at Leeds game Glasner and Iraola among long-term candidates Ruben Amorim was sacked by Manchester United on Monday morning after 14 months as their head coach. He departs after a power struggle with the hierarchy over transfer policy, with Amorim demanding his ¬≠colleagues in the recruitment department ‚Äúdo their job‚Äù following Sunday‚Äôs draw at Leeds. His immediate replacement is Darren Fletcher, who takes charge as interim head coach. The Scot, a former United midfielder and the ¬≠current under-18s coach, will lead the side at Burnley on Wednesday and could remain in charge for Sunday‚Äôs FA Cup tie with Brighton. Continue reading...

items.title: 'Appointing Nancy one of clueless Celtic's greatest blunders'
items.summary: There is "no apparent big picture view at Celtic", argues BBC Sport Scotland's Tom English as Wilfried Nancy and Paul Tisdale exit the ailing champions.

items.title: Difficult questions loom for Manchester United higher-ups after Amorim‚Äôs axing | Jamie Jackson
items.summary: Fallout from a dour and unsuccessful reign will hit well-paid executives who backed the outgoing head coach Ruben Amorim‚Äôs tenure as Manchester United head coach began its final unravelling via four words uttered in Friday‚Äôs media conference to preview the weekend trip to Leeds. ‚ÄúYou are very smart,‚Äù was Amorim‚Äôs signoff to this correspondent‚Äôs last question regarding if the Portuguese had been informed of a change in the January transfer budget by Jason Wilcox, the director of football. The question was asked in reaction to Amorim‚Äôs odd comment on Christmas Eve that he was beginning to ‚Äúunderstand‚Äù the finance was not available to sign the footballers needed to ‚Äúplay a perfect 3-4-3‚Äù. Hearing this, the radar bleeped red ‚Äì Amorim was clearly countenancing changing from a system he was quasi-obsessed with. Continue reading...

items.title: O'Neill returns to Celtic for rest of season
items.summary: Martin O'Neill is returning to Celtic as manager for the remainder of the season following the dismissal of Wilfried Nancy.
